title: 3dZcutup
description: Cut slices off a dataset in its z-direction and write a new dataset

keep_slices.title: Keep Slices
keep_slices.description: Keep slices numbered 'b' through 't', inclusive. This is a mandatory option. Slice numbers start at 0.

prefix.title: Output Prefix
prefix.description: Write result into dataset with the given prefix [default = 'zcutup']

dataset.title: Input Dataset
dataset.description: The input dataset (e.g., epi07+orig). You can use a sub-brick selector on the input dataset.
